metadata.name: KOVO Cup Trophy
metadata.description: Our mission i s to celebrate the Kovo cup as a universal symbol of unity and bring people from all walks of life together through the power of art. We believe that the solo cup has the ability to transcend cultural and societal boundaries and bring people together in a way that i s meaningful and authentic. Through our project, we aim to promote the values of optimism, unity and inclusivity, and use the solo cup as a vehicle to bring people together to inspire and create positive change in the world!
